title.rendered: Iftar for blue collared workers across the Emirates

content.rendered: During the Holy Month, TTE distributed a total of 464 iftar packages amongst its blue collared workers spread across the emirates. The packages, were arranged to be delivered by team leaders to TTE’s labor camps located in Abu Dhabi, Deira, Khorfakkan, Fujairah, Umm Al Qwain and Jebel Ali on the same day. Upon breaking the fast, workers from their respective camps enjoyed a hearty meal with their colleagues.
